category.name: Solution-Specific.Mechatronics

preference.name: APN_absolute_path_name_separator
preference.preference_description: Defines the separator used between the parentNodeName and the childNodeName while displaying the absolute path name for a given AppearancePathNode. Valid Values: Accepts a single string as a value. The following special characters are recommended values: , ; / #
